text: @MikeBloomberg So right, Mr. Bloomberg, you are so right. Trump won't call Coronavirus a pandemic because he is afraid of alienating a lot of his voters. The voters who probably gave big bucks to the pharmaceutical industry are those who don't believe this is a disease to be taken seriously.

entity.name: President Trump puts VP Pence in charge of US response to coronavirus
entity.description: Donald Trump said the risk to the US from the deadly coronavirus “remains very low” and that he has put Vice President Mike Pence in charge of the American response to the outbreak.
